name: UnderNovel DEMO
description:
When you make a shortcut, (if you want) change the default Ren'Py icon (I don't know how to do it in the code) to the UnderNovel icon located in game/images/icon.ico

NOTE: This has only been tested on PC, so the Mac and Lunix builds might not work properly.

All other information can be found in the main menu under 'About'.
